@graph.name: Rodrigo Ferreira
@graph.description: Rodrigo Ferreira currently works at the Departamento de Ecologia e Conservação (Department of Ecology and Conservation), from the Universidade Federal de Lavras (UFLA). Rodrigo does research in Zoology and Ecology of subterranean ecosystems.
award: IG Nobel Prize, Biology category, for the work: "Female Penis, Male Vagina, and Their Correlated Evolution in a Cave Insect", Annals of Improbable Research.
The species Iuiuniscus iuiuensis, described by us, was considered among the Top 10 species of the year, 2016., ESF International Institute for Species Exploration.

The article "Female Penis, Male Vagina, and their Correlated Evolution in a Cave Insect", published in Current Biology magazine ranked 14th in the list of the 100 most impactful publications of 2014, Altmetric.
